name: Flightless Simulator
description:
The Genre: Flight Simulator

The Missing Mechanic: Flight

As part of the GM GameJam. this is a flight simulator game where you are not allowed to fly and instead, you should navigate to your destination using the streets, which can be quite challenging. 

The backstory:

Air travel is one of the biggest contributors to air pollution and  because of that the government decided to ban all air transportation. And now you have to deliver your passengers to their destination without getting off the ground.
